default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^Interested in some top-quality magical weaponry? One of a kind, truly!
^Please buy it off my hands! I can’t bear to keep something so beautiful and rare!

c-1: ^Not at all, young lady! Even someone like you could wield it with ease!

b: ^Yesss! Thank you for your business. You’re gonna get rich selling this bad boy!
d: ^You don’t even have that much money, do you? Tch. Whatever... I’m taking my offer elsewhere!
e: ^The nerve! I’ll find someone who appreciates real craftsmanship!
f: ^Clearly, you don’t understand what you’re looking at. Let’s try this again, shall we?
g: ^I told you it’s top quality! Well... okay, maybe not legit quality... Anyway, I’m off to find someone else!
i: ^Why are people so judgmental about things built in China? Everything comes from there. You can’t expect modern weapons to be built anywhere else, yes??
